articles.title: Wrangling Redux: reducer size
articles.summary: Redux is not the 'new hotness'. In fact, that it's probably quite far along the downward slope of the technology hype cycle. As far as state management for your average website goes, it's total overkill, as it introduces a lot of additional complexity for little concrete benefit.
